Source code for argoss_libs.snmp.skeletton

import argparse



[docs]class SNMPSkeletton:
    @staticmethod

[docs]    def default_args(description,
                     port=161,
                     version=2,
                     warning=80.0,
                     critical=90.0):
        argp = argparse.ArgumentParser(
          description=description,
          formatter_class=argparse.ArgumentDefaultsHelpFormatter
        )
        argp.add_argument('--host', '-H', required=True, help='Host target')
        argp.add_argument('--port', '-p', default=port, type=int, help='Port')
        argp.add_argument('--version', '-v', default=version, help='SNMP Version')
        argp.add_argument('--community', '-C', help='SNMP Community', default='bornan')
        argp.add_argument('--warning', '-w', default=warning, type=float, metavar='RANGE', help='Warning')
        argp.add_argument('--critical', '-c', default=critical, type=float, metavar='RANGE', help='Critical')
        argp.add_argument('--verbose', '-V', action='count', default=0)

        return argp
